credit_line: Museum purchase from Drawings and Prints Council Fund through gift of The Florence Gould Foundation
title: Design for a Corsage Ornament: Night
provenance: David Weinstein, New York City; Barry Friedman, Ltd., New York City
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite, brush and gouache on brownish, translucent wove paper, possibly coated with resin
description: On framing plaques, two nudes, personifications of Night, toss showers of stars into sky.  In central portion, nine large blue sapphires amid diamond stars and constellations recreate the Milky Way.
name: Drawing
